name: Many Many Fish Fish
description:
sensory interventionslets  go fishing , Grab your net  and hop in the boat. Bring in the fish home  

navigate  the rivers  while in your own boat. grab the right amount of fish for each problem that pops up. get them right  to raise your score , get the wrong fish counts and game over.

Part of our learning system  games we want to reinvent learning games and make them more better

game focus:  sensory interventions

coordination-  migrating  each side of the rivers  to catch/avoid objects

Problem/Solution engagement- Engage in basic addition math problems while achieving the correct answer.

Reaction- engaging specific fish targets. Reacting to a time limit/ achieving to extend time

Choice and options- Choice in what to do in game as well as engage the main objective.. example the choice to drop fish after catching to catch other fish to drop in main basket .

Challenge and difficulty.  Engage users with 2 level modes. one under time, another with a capture restriction and time.

Version 1.0 

Sound Enabled

Choice of custom boat 

Difficulty system is as follows.

Easy- 3 lives no time. Slow river speed

Medium- 3 lives and timed . can extend time by catching timers. river speed is More quicker

Hard- 3 lives , Timed,  Net Capture limit to 5 items. Can extend time by catching timers. River speed is Fast.
